notes: regular -ere verb; irregular passato remoto 'seppe'; past participle 'saputo'
example_sentence_english: I want to know the truth.

example_sentence_italian: Sapendo la verità, ho cambiato idea.
example_sentence_english: Knowing the truth, I changed my mind.
I have found out the news.
You have found out the news.

translation_english: he has found out/she has found out/you (formal) have found out
notes: used with auxiliary avere; also used as formal 'Lei'
example_sentence_english: He has found out the truth.
Have you (plural) found out the truth?
They have found out the news.
